channel.title: Posts on Han and the Telescreen
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Han and the Telescreen

item.description: The Great American Joke Since the 70s, the American public’s confidence in news media and the government has been on a steady decline. It’s almost natural that something like The Daily Show (TDS) would come out of this time of distrust to ridicule these rotting institutions. In the beginning when TDS just premiered at Comedy Central, it was a simple comedy show that uses news format only as a framing for the jokes.
